ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) bag fresh spinach - rinsed, dried and torn into bite size pieces
¼ cup chopped red bell pepper

cookingTips: Tear spinach by hand rather than chopping to preserve its delicate texture
Mix filling ingredients gently to avoid overworking and creating a dense texture
Let filling rest 15 minutes before baking for flavors to develop
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the method of combining delicate ingredients affect the final crumb and lightness of this pie?
